channel.title: Item Config?
channel.description:
Hey,
I need a bit of help . I tried & failed. hahaha
I was trying to make a code so that you need playerrights >= 3 to wield a certain item... Can anyone help please? Also is there a way to remove an item from EVERYONE that has ever played on your server? Like when they login it gets removed?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 27, 2008, 01:45:54 AM[/size][hr]*bump*
